Name: Base Defense VR
About the game: You are a constructor robot with the order to build a forwarded base to support the Infiltration of your army. You are one of a million robots controlled by an independent master AI, build by an ancient civilization somewhere in the galaxy. The goal is to eliminate every life possible, so you travel from planet to planet in order to fight every civilization you face. What you will find in Base Defense VR: 20+ Turrets Mechs Realistic Graphics Turret Upgrades Player Progression 3 Maps (More to come)
